message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I believe will be valuable to you. I'm offering it to you for $13,000.  This is a fair price considering the value it holds for you. Let me know what you think!

I appreciate your understanding of the product's value, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm on a tight budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $11,000?

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $11,000 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $12,000 to reflect your budget, but I can't go any lower.  This is still a good deal for you, as you'll be getting the product for significantly less than its true value.  Let's see if we can reach an agreement.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $12,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm thinking more along the lines of $10,500. I'm really interested in the product and I'm willing to make a serious offer. Would you be willing to meet me at $10,500?
